recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian meat sauce served over al dente spaghetti.
steps: Chop onion and garlic.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté onion until translucent.
Add garlic and ground beef, cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer 45 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and garnish with extra basil.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy, spiced tomato curry sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 30 minutes.
Sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger in oil until soft.
Add tomato puree, cook 5 minutes.
Stir in cream and marinated chicken. Simmer 25–30 minutes until chicken is cooked.
Adjust seasoning and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: A colorful bowl of quinoa, roasted chickpeas, and fresh veggies.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package directions.
Toss chickpeas with 1 tbsp oil, salt, and pepper; roast 15 minutes at 200°C.
Slice avocado and carrot into ribbons.
Assemble bowls with quinoa, chickpeas, spinach, avocado, and carrot.
Drizzle with remaining oil and lemon juice before serving.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft-baked cookies loaded with melty chocolate chips.
steps: Cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg and vanilla.
Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt; gradually add to butter mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake 10 minutes at 180°C.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A fresh, no-cook salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, feta, and olives.
steps: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and onion; place in a bowl.
Crumble feta over the veggies and scatter olives.
Whisk oil, lemon juice, oregano, and salt, then toss with salad.
Serve immediately or chill 10 minutes to meld flavors.

recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.description: Golden, fluffy pancakes perfect for a weekend breakfast.
steps: Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, beat egg and milk together.
Pour wet into dry ingredients; stir until just combined.
Melt butter in a skillet, then pour ¼-cup batter for each pancake.
Cook 2–3 minutes per side until golden.
